name: No Ground Here
description:
Welcome to No Ground Here! Build your air ships and explore the floating islands!

Control:

WASD - movement

RMB - grab the item (drag&drop)

LMB - use selected equipment

Mouse Wheel - rotate the grabbed item

E - use motor (enable/disable)

1,2,3 - equipment switch(1 - balloons,  2 - nails, 3 - rope)

R - restart
